message: I propose we split it 75/25. This way, I'm able to secure a larger portion while still being fair.
I'm willing to compromise and give you a decent amount, but I think I deserve a bit more considering the initial value of the money.
Considering the decrease in the value of money due to inflation, I propose a split of 52.5/47.5. This maintains fairness while adjusting for the changing value of the currency.
I'm willing to meet you halfway and give you a slightly larger portion, considering the impact of inflation. Let's see if this compromise works out.
